column3: Auto capitalize first word in a sentence.

column4: Trick in hotstring section: instead of sending just capital letters (e.g. {BS}A) actually is send Unicode character which represents capital letter A. Because if just letter A is send, actually AutoHotkey sends sequence {shift down}a{shift up}, so ordinary letter is send. Sending Unicode character sends actually capital letter instead. When capital letter is send, other scripts like ShiftFunctions are able to recognize it and after pressing Shift such capital letter can be altered into capital diacritic letter. To work this way this library must be send with SendLevel = 2.
